metadata.title: CVE-2023-52583 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ceph:fix deadlock or deadcode of misusing dget() The lock order is incorrectbetween denty and its parent, we should always make sure that the parentget the lock first. But since this deadcode is never used and the parentdir will always be set from the callers, let's just remove it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
